resources.string:
0.6.4

• prevent wrongly synchronized programs
• miscellaneous improvements/bug fixes of Thorsten1976

0.6.3.7

• fixed cut off descriptions in detail view
• try to prevent default vibration of system for Reminders

0.6.3.6

• extended runtime until 2019-12-31
• fixed possible crash

0.6.3.5

• try to prevent crash at data update if incompatible data for a channel is downloaded
• fix possible crash at database access
• fix possible crash at editing favorites

0.6.3.4

• added setting to allow use of unstable Internet connections for data update

0.6.3.3

• fixed possible crash
• added fallback to default mirrors for data download

0.6.3.2

• changed channel download to prevent daily automatically channel update
• recognize connectivity change during data update
• changed default value for reminder as alarm clock in Android since 6.0

0.6.3.1

• added setting to disable reminder being scheduled as alarm clock under Android 6.0

0.6.3

• added link to privacy statement
• synchronization data is send via a secure Internet connection
• tried to fix untimed reminders under Android 6.0 (reminders are set as alarms)
• find SD cards for database storing under Android 6.0 too
• longer timeout for channel data download
• show end date of EPGpaid access in settings
• restore database storage location from backup only if database file is accessible
• extended runtime until 2017-06-01

0.6.2.5

• better prevention of gaps in EPGpaid data
• fix wrong preselected search place for keyword filter
• better separators in widgets
• update date in running programs when new day has begun
• better search for next programs in running programs
• better switch to programs list for channel click (times are better found)
• settings of special time buttons of running programs also under time buttons

0.6.2.4

• fixed possible crash

0.6.2.3

• long click on now shows next in running programs tab
• long click on time buttons opens selection for any time in running programs tab
• added button to select any time in running programs tab
• added any time selection to time scroll menu
• fix missing calculation of program duration in minutes at data update
• last selected favorite preselected after start
• fixed minor bugs

0.6.2.2

• fix possible crash at startup
• added workaround for broken date selection on Samsung devices with Android 5.0

0.6.2.1

• autoselect first time in running programs if date selection is changed

0.6.2

• added widget to toggle reminder state (running/paused)
• show paused reminder state with red colored action bar
• reminder state can be kept through reboots
• new filter type Keyword
• color of horizontal program separators configurable
• color with HEX code also for text color
• added new scroll target Next to time selection

0.6.1

• more than one filter at a time possible
• added possibility to enter color with HEX code
• keep old version of EPGpaid data to lessen missing data for programs
• prevent timed auto update at hours the data might be inconsistent if EPGpaid is unlocked
• make sure plugins are load again after TV-Browser is resumed without being left with the back button
• update date selections after day changed without using back button to leave TV-Browser
• time selection with layout of Android prior of Lollipop

0.6.0.9

• fixed possible crash at startup

0.6.0.8

• fixed missing setup message at first startup

0.6.0.7

• removed ability to disable SSL check for EPGpaid downloads
• fixed bugs

0.6.0.6

• fixed missing listing of running and expired programs in program list tab
• safer storing of sorting of channels
• fixed bugs

0.6.0.5

• ask user before sorting alphabetically
• fixed bugs

0.6.0.4

• shorter timeout for not reacting Internet connections
• fixed bugs

0.6.0.3

• prevent usage delay after startup
• prevent leading and trailing white spaces for EPGpaid user name and passwort

0.6.0.2

• highlighting also actor matches of Favorites in detail view
• program list tab starts only with data of today and tomorrow
• fixed bugs

0.6.0.1

• allow to disable SSL check for EPGpaid download
• remove WirSchauen info from programs if EPGpaid description is available
• fixed bugs

0.6

• edit favorites from program context menu
• highlighting of matches of Favorites in detail view
• added support for descriptions and pictures from EPGpaid
• new material icons for action bar
• new notification icons
• fixed bugs

0.5.9.7

• fixed bugs in edit favorites activity
• fixed bugs at favorite search and quotes in search
• include running programs in quick search results
• extended runtime until 2016-09-01

0.5.9.6

• slightly smaller TV-Browser icon
• fixed possible crash at auto data update

0.5.9.5

• new TV-Browser icon
• configurable priority of reminder notifications
• prevent auto data update with low battery state
• show warning for manual data update for low battery state
• fixed wrong label for channel name only in settings

0.5.9.4

• fixed possible crash at startup
• fixed wrong shown program entries in changed Favorite

0.5.9.3

• added LED color preference for reminders

0.5.9.2

• fixed missing text scaling in widgets for program info

0.5.9.1

• fixed bug in manual data download

0.5.9

• create Favorites directly from unsuccessful search
• database can be moved to sd card
• stop reminder update service after update is done
• fixed possible unwanted synchronizing with usage of mobile connection at auto update
• fixed unreleased wake lock at auto update of channels
• added new logging values to data update log

0.5.8.12

• fixed bug at requesting programs from PluginManager
• added new function to Plugin interface
• fixed more minor bugs

0.5.8.11

• removed ability to move TV-Browser to SD card
• fixed not working date selection in program table with Android Lollipop
• fixed more minor bugs

0.5.8.10

• swipe through in detail view can be disabled
• fixed possible crash with too many reminders and Android Lollipop
• fixed some minor bugs

0.5.8.9

• new time values for reminder
• fixed some bugs

0.5.8.8

• swipe trough programs of channel in detail view
• configurable frequency of automatically channel update

0.5.8.7

• remove duplicate channels
• fixed bugs that could lead to crash
• make sure Reminders are shown at scheduled time in Android since 4.4

0.5.8.6

• fixed problems during data and "I don't want to see" update that could cause crash
• fixed possible crash at startup

0.5.8.5

• fixed minor problems that could cause crash

0.5.8.4

• new logging for Plugin functions possible
• speed up start
• changed auto update process (might prolong battery life)

0.5.8.3

• add/remove reminders from detail window
• speed up synchronization of "I don't want to see" values
• minor bug fixes

0.5.8.2

• save current date only at first startup of day
• delay plugin loading at startup
• added warning for possible wrong timezone

0.5.8.1

• fixed possible crash at startup with activated channel filter

0.5.8

• added new filter type for filtering program categories
• fixed not working context menu entries in program table
• better actor layout in detail view
• exclusions of Favorite with title type work also in other fields

0.5.7.3

• fix crash for selecting exclusion Favorite (could happen at startup)
• decode multiple episode number for program info

0.5.7.2

• sync markings can be removed
• info about changes after version update can be deactivated
• added global message for data update done (can be used by other apps)
• added global message for reminded programs (can be used by other apps)
• show number of found favorites in favorites tab
• show mark icons for marked programs (not in program table)

0.5.7.1

• speed up synchronization
• new icons for previous and next day in program table
• user defined colors for widget texts
• changed processing of Favorites
• fixed possible crash at deleting of Favorites
• don\'t show programs of "I don\'t want to see" at quick search

0.5.7

• fixed possible problem with loading of available download servers
• fixed possible problem with deleting of removed programs
• removed channels are deleted
• picture description position in detail window configurable
• more zoom values for detail window
• Edit/Delete Favorites also from ActionBar
• added donation value for EPGdonate
• full transparent background for widgets possible
• EPGdonate channels are marked in channels selection

0.5.6.1

• use channel icon color values for detail window also
• fix possible crash caused by program list

0.5.6

• color of background of channel icons configurable
• size of filling of background of channel icons configurable
• border for channel icons possible
• color of border of channel icons configurable
• restore widget update after time selection
• prevent possible crash with opening program list from channel click
• make sure program list is always opened on channel click in widgets

0.5.5.1

• restore missing date and channel selection in program list

0.5.5

• update program list only when needed
• added workaround to force showing of overflow menu button in action bar (might not work on every device)
• initialize widgets after device is started
• prevent possible crash for opening dialog windows
• zoom pictures of program accordingly to screen density
• fix wrong font size for new channels info dialog
• prevent wrong search results in Favorites

0.5.4.2

• fixed wrong color for search with light theme
• added workaround for crash on LG devices on menu button click

0.5.4.1

• added workaround to try to fix crash on Samsung and Wiko devices with Android 4.2
• Internet connection check accepts more response codes

0.5.4

• fixed missing context menu for drop down view of favorites on Android 5.0
• fixed bugs in filter menu
• make sure widget header click always opens TV-Browser
• tweaked bright theme
• search for new/updated channels regularly
• added support for Material design
• use dark theme by default

0.5.3.2

• fixed possible crash with channels without program categories

0.5.3.1

• fixed problem of missing deletion removed programs during data update
• category colors for program table also
• show program markings visualisation in widgets

0.5.3

• added user defined program category color (not for program table)
• added category display for widgets
• fixed not working download LAN connections
• made drive access for data download more safe
• added workaround for not working Plugin settings on problematic Android devices
• fix error in Channel handling for Plugins
• use "I don't want to see!" exclusions for program list widget

0.5.2

• make sure Plugin settings don\'t causes crash
• fixed problems with Plugin search
• better information for channel synchronisation

0.5.1

• added type selection to important widget (can be used as program list)
• fixed possible crash caused by Plugins

0.5.0.2

• fixed channel restriction for Favorite backup (backup needs to be upload again)

0.5.0.1

• fixed crash under Android 5.0 with installed Plugins

0.5

• added first version of the Plugin interface
• added "Next" to running widget
• added search for Plugins
• removed manually markings function (can be integrated with Plugins)
• removed calendar export and mail functionality (can be integrated with Plugins)
• added new color style for dark theme
• added support for EPGdonate data channels
• fixed bug in preferences backup

0.4.5.4

• hide buttons in action bar when search is selected
• added news access

0.4.5.3

• fixed possible crash with enabled program table

0.4.5.2

• fixed possible bug at database upgrade
• channels can be backuped at the TV-Browser server direct from the app

0.4.5.1

• fixed date bug caused by daylight savings time
• testet compatibility with Android 5.0

0.4.5

• added new restriction for program attributes in Favorites
• fixed bug in Favorite time restriction
• added more global settings for widgets
• layout style of Favorites tab selectable in layout settings
• icon for new Favorite in ActionBar

0.4.4 • added user editable channel filters
• new type of Favorite with search only for rules
• changed default value for divider size in lists with programs
• added duration restriction to Favorites
• update icon in ActionBar only visible if auto update is disabled
• enable/disable auto data update possible in data update dialog
• vertical space around programs selectable for lists with programs and widgets
• information about changes in version on version change
• widgets also possible on lock screen
• added additional global settings for widgets

0.4.3

• fixed missing restoring of Favorites from synchronized settings
• new layout for Favorites tab
• new layout for program lists on small screens
• bigger channel icons selectable for widgets and program lists
• safer update of widgets
• added global settings for widgets
• text size scaling for widgets
• new separator for list entries of widgets

0.4.2

• shown time of widget "Now running" selectable
• full data downloaded by default

0.4.1

• backup of preferences and favorite definitions to TV-Browser server
• synchronize sort number of channel from desktop version
• fixed bug in saving of preferences of "Important Programs" widget

0.4

• added widget for running and important programs (to use it TV-Browser has to be stored on internal drive)
• reminder up to 24h before program start
• added new color style
• made auto update more stable
• speed up channel download
• fixed bug at data update for channels with more than 127 programs per day

0.3.3

• add ability to deactivate date display in programs list
• fixed wrong calculation of auto data update time
• fixed missing synchronization of reminders during auto data update
• refresh reminders every activation of device in Android
• fixed possible crash
• time selection for Running Programs also from button in action bar

0.3.2

• speed up data update
• tried to fix possible crash with workaround
• sort Favorite list alphabetically in Favorite tab
• changed handling of Reminders

0.3.1.1

• fixed possible update problems of changed programs at data update

0.3.1

• fixed possible crash at data update
• fixed layout problems in favorite activity
• added ability to highlight "I don't want to see" programs instead of removing

0.3

• added filter for favorite search
• new favorite edit activity
• added filter for channel type
• speeded up "I don't want to see" filtering
• changed data update
• configurable description for email and calendar export
• up to 24 time buttons configurable
• change update calculation of auto update
• added drag and drop support for channel sort
• added workaround for channel timezone GMT+01:00 instead of CET
What is new in this version?

No program was found for the search.

Do you want to create a Favorite from this search now?

(Favorites might find more programs than a quick search.)
The channels will be sorted alphabetically now.\n\nAre you sure?
Not all channels could be downloaded successfully.\n\nIf you are missing channels you should try loading the channels later again.
Username and/or Password could not be validated.\nDo you want to enter it again?
New channel were found or existing channels were updated
You can select channels new channels here. (Updated subscribed channels are preselected.)
The listed channels are no longer available and no data is stored for this channels on the device, this might be a temporarily problem. Select the channels that should be remove permanently.
Do you want to sort the channels now?
The system uses German as language but the timezone is not Central European Time.\n\nIf the start time of the programs is wrong, you need to change the timezone setting in the system.
Do you really want to delete the Favorite \'{0}\'?
This version will stop working in {0} days.\n\nPlease install an update for the app.
This version will stop working from tomorrow on.\n\nPlease install an update for the app.
Email address for sending program information.
Search program titles and episode titles

The selected Favorite has no found programs.

To edit or delete Favorites, please select it and click long on the selected entry or use the heart icon.

To add a new Favorite click on the heart icon.
Mo, Tu, We, Th, Fr, Sa, Su
Your EPGpaid access will expire on {0}.\n\nIf you purchase again now and your payment is received until {0}, the access of your account will be extended for 12 months.
The EPGpaid username/password could not be validated.\n\nPlease check the entered credentials and your Internet connection.
Your network connection is disabled. Enable it before starting {0}.
the synchronization of I don\'t want to see!
The battery state is critical for data update.\n\nDo you want to start it anyway?
A TV-Browser data update is running

http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

The usage time of TV-Browser for Android can be limited. You can see the limit on the about page. It is guaranteed that an update is available free of charge after the limit is reached, as long as the developers of TV-Browser for Android are able and willing to release updates.

All TV/Radio listings provided by TV-Browser (http://www.tvbrowser.org) are protected by copyright laws and may only be used within TV-Browser or other name like applications authorized by the manufacturer of TV-Browser (http://www.tvbrowser.org) for information about the upcoming program of the available channels.

Every other manner of using, reproducing or redistributing of the TV/Radio listings is illegal and may be prosecuted on civil or criminal law. On downloading the TV/Radio listings you declare your agreement to these terms.

If you have any questions concerning these terms please contact dev@tvbrowser.org
Click short on a channel to select sort number or click long and keep holding to move channel.

You can synchronize your with the channels from your desktop TV-Browser.

You will have to register a user first and export your channels from your desktop TV-Browser with the Android Sync plugin.

You don't need to register if you wan't use the app without synchronization.

Do you wish to synchronize your channels now or do you wish to select the channels manually?
You can replace your current selected channels with the synchronization data or only add new channels to your selected channels.\n\nWhat should be done?

You can replace your current exclusion list with the synchronization data or only add new exclusions for "I don't want to see!".

The joined exclusions will be uploaded to the server if you add the new exclusions.

What should be done?
Shows info if EPGpaid is not unlocked about missing descriptions in detail view.

If your credentials cannot be validated and you are sure to have entered correct credentials and an Internet connection is available for validation, you can disable the check of the SSL certificate to circumvent possible problems.

Since 2008 many private TV and radio stations are request a fee for the display of descriptions and pictures in electronic program guides like TV-Browser.

That is the reason why that information cannot be provided for free. But it is possible to get descriptions and most times also pictures with EPGpaid for a small amount every year.

How much yu need to pay and how it works you can read at: https://www.epgpaid.de

(Click here to open the site.)
The database is currently not available, if you change this setting now, you will lose all data.

You are storing the database on an external drive.

You shouldn't do that.

THERE WILL BE NO SUPPORT FOR INSTALLATIONS WITH DATABASE ON EXTERNAL DRIVE.

You also might experience a crash of TV-Browser once after moving the database.
The used Internet connection is very slow or unstable. TV-Browser should download the data nonetheless even if the download needs much time.
The used Internet connection is fast and reliable. TV-Browser will cancel the data download if the connection seems to be unstable.
Which information should be shown in the details window?

No description or picture can be shown for this program because of license restrictions.

You can unlock the descriptions and pictures for circa 1 Euro cent.

More about it at https://www.epgpaid.de
Which information should be shown in the lists with programs?
Allows to swipe through the programs of the shown channel.
Swipe through the programs of the shown channel is not possible.
Which program information should be shown if available?
Color program categories with user defined colors

The program table needs a lot of memory. The more channels and details you\'ve selected the more memory wil be consumed. That can lead to a crash of the TV-Browser app. So make sure not to select to many channels and details or disable the program table.
The usage of the program table may significantly slow down TV-Browser.
Configure the time buttons in the running programs list.
The moment next can be selected directly with the button Next, in the time menu or with a long click on Now.
The moment next can be selected in the time menu or with a long click on Now.
Time pick button only when needed
The button to enter any time value is only shown when a time was picked.
The button to enter any time value is always shown.
Times that are expired for 3 hours are showing the programs of tomorrow.
Write log file for data update

A log file with information about the data update will be written. It is not deleted automatically and keeps growing until it is bigger than 5MB at the begin of the data update or you delete it manually.
A log file with information about the function of the Reminder will be written. It is not deleted automatically and keeps growing until it reaches 5MB.
A log file with information about the function of the Plugins will be written. It is not deleted automatically and keeps growing until it reaches 5MB.
Send log file for data update
Delete log file of data update
No log file found for sending.
No log file found for deleting.
Log file could not be deleted.\nIt will be deleted if the app is closed the next time.
{0} log file for TV-Browser for Android
The attachments contains the {0} log file of TV-Browser for Android, from
To use the synchronization with the desktop TV-Browser you have to enter a user name and a password in the menu.
Settings for synchronization with the desktop TV-Browser
Programs that are exported by the AndroidSync plugin from the desktop version.
Programs that are marked as Favorite are exported to desktop TV-Browser.
Reminders that are exported by the AndroidSync plugin from the desktop version are imported.
Programs that are marked as Reminders are exported to desktop TV-Browser.
Programs that were marked by Plugins are exported to desktop TV-Browser.
You will have to register a user first to use the synchronization with the desktop TV-Browser.
What should be excluded? (You can use the wildcard *)
The Reminders will be paused until you continue them or the system is restarted.
The Reminders will be paused until you continue them.
Could not synchronize \'I don\'t want to see!\' exclusion list.\nDid you upload the exclusion list with the AndroidSync plugin?
Successfully synchronized exclusion list of \'I don\'t want to see!\'
Fill background of channel icon to full size
Background of channel icons is filled with the background color to make all icons the same size.
Time buttons appear sorted by time
Time buttons appear in below order
Sound which is played for reminders
Reminder will be added as alarm clock to make sure it will be shown even in doze mode of device.
Reminder will be added as simple alarm. In that case it might happen, that reminders will not be shown at the time it was schedules if the device is in doze mode.

If the reminder was paused and the reminder state is kept the reminder will stay paused after a reboot of the device. Otherwise the reminder will activate itself automatically after a reboot of the device.
Click on channel opens programs list and shows program in chanel program.
Background color of on air programs.
Progress color of on air programs
Color for by Plugins marked programs.
Time progress of on air programs is shown in the background.

Rating

You are using TV-Browser for some time. If you want you can rate TV-Browser on Google Play.

Donations

If you like TV-Browser and you are at lest 18 years old, please consider to make a donation for the development of TV-Browser.
You can donate directly with InApp payment from a list of possible amounts. (You won\'t be charged unless you accept the donation in Google Play.)
To see possible ways of donating to the TV-Browser development you can look at the website of TV-Browser for Android.
Thank you for considering to make a donation, you can select from the following donations (these contains 30% Google Play transaction fee and the VAT):
You are about to make a donation of {0}.\n\nWith clicking on \'Yes, make donation\' you confirm that you are at least 18 years and therefor allowed to make donations.
Thank you for donating for TV-Browser for Android.
Could not establish connection to Google Play.\n\nPlease try again later
or use a different donation method.
You have already donated {0} on {1}. Thanks again for that donation.\n\nDo you really want to donate again?
At the moment no donation is possible.\nPlease try again later.
Background color of the selected time.
Loading of program table is delayed until it is opened for the first time. (Speeds up startup if not started on program table tab.)
No Reminders to update where received

string-array.name: pref_programs_list_show_date_entries
string-array.item: Only for all programs if all data is displayed

string-array.name: pref_programs_list_show_channel_entries
string-array.item: Only for all programs if all channels are selected

resources.string: Markings of programs are visualized in the widgets
What colors should be used for text?
Channels successfully stored on TV-Browser server
Backup successfully stored on TV-Browser server
Backup successfully restored from TV-Browser server
Backup could not be restored, maybe it was never uploaded.

You can upload the preferences and favorite definitions to the TV-Browser server. The selected channels and the "I don\'t want to see!" list are not saved.\n\nDo you want\'t to upload the preferences and favorite definitions now?

If you previously had uploaded the preferences and favorite definitions to the TV-Browser server, you can restore it from there. The current preferences and favorite definitions will be overridden!

Do you want't to restore the preferences and favorite definitions now?

(TV-Browser will quit after restoring of the preferences and favorites)
You have subscribed to {0} EPGdonate data channels

The data provided by EPGdonate data is generally free, but to maintain this service everybody who is able to (and has at least attained full age) should donate a yearly amount.

How much is up to the number of users and donators of EPGdonate data, the more the less the yearly amount can be.

You will be shown how much the suggested amount is at certain times. If you cannot donate the suggested amount, you may be able to donate less. If you absolutely cannot donate anything you are free to use EPGdonate without donation. You also can donate more than the suggested amount to sponsor the data for people who are not able to donate.

Ways to donate will be available on the website of EPGdonate data: http://epgdonate.natsu-no-yuki.de

{0}
For {0} the suggested donation amount is: {1}
Don\'t show again this message this year:
I will donate for this year
No Plugins were found that can be installed.

TV-Browser can be extended with new functions by Plugins.

If you miss a function you may find it in a Plugin.

Do you want to open the list with the available Plugins now (you later can search for Plugins from the menu of TV-Browser)?
